rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {EC305, EC369, EC3694, EC3695, EC3695E, ECC3690%, ECC3694, ECO3690, ECO3694}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ECC2000, ECC2010, ECC5900, ECC5901} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {EC305, EC369, EC3694, EC3695, EC3695E, ECC3690%, ECC3694, ECO3690, ECO3694}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ECC2000, ECC2010, ECC5900, ECC5901} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Investigation of economic interaction between countries in the context of international exchanges of commodities and assets. Topics include the balance of payments, nominal and real exchange rate determination, international capital movements, foreign debt, structural reform and adjustment policies in the open economy, the gains from international trade, inter-industry trade, tariff policies.
